text: 13.15: Ru 14.5; 19.9Ana maaŋ nzuaim, Zisas ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Nde bigi guiguigi gumgi ma! Nde buni nzuav, nde mbui tɨvi mba buni zɨn vui fhuvara. Nde vhɨra Sabatar kha tɨvi ga mbui. Nde vov wari wo tor daa bɨnin vegap, nta thɨɨ fhɨrim, nta kɨrar him, nde ntan ko vuim, nta phara pi.
